name: Orichalcos Dexia
text: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned with "Orichalcos Shunoros", and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. Cannot be destroyed while you control a "Orichalcos Shunoros". If this card battles with your opponent's monster: This card's ATK becomes equal to either that Attack Position monster's ATK or that Defense Position monster's DEF, + 300 until the end of the Damage Step. After damage calculation, 1 "Orichalcos Shunoros" you control loses ATK equal to the ATK this card had during the Damage Step. If "Orichalcos Shunoros" leaves the field: Destroy this card.
